name: Jacqueline TUMOLO v. Joseph J. FOLEY and City of Philadelphia. Appeal of CITY OF PHILADELPHIA

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Jacqueline TUMOLO v. Joseph J. FOLEY and City of Philadelphia. Appeal of CITY OF PHILADELPHIA.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Commonwealth Court reversed, 149 Pa.Cmwlth. 645, 612 A.2d 1104. See Johnson v. Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority, 524 Pa. 209, 570 A.2d 71 (1990).
LARSEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Alan C. Ostrow, Judith E. Harris, Philadelphia, for City of Philadelphia.
Charles F. Volz, Jr., Philadelphia, for J. Tumolo.
John B. Kowalewski, Philadelphia, for Joseph Foley.
casebody.head_matter:
634 A.2d 613
Jacqueline TUMOLO v. Joseph J. FOLEY and City of Philadelphia. Appeal of CITY OF PHILADELPHIA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1993.
Decided Dec. 21, 1993.
Alan C. Ostrow, Judith E. Harris, Philadelphia, for City of Philadelphia.
Charles F. Volz, Jr., Philadelphia, for J. Tumolo.
John B. Kowalewski, Philadelphia, for Joseph Foley.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
